recipe.title: Romaine Salad with Anchovy Dressing and Parmesan
ingredients: 3 hearts of romaine (20 to 22 ounces total), torn into pieces
6 ounces Parmigiano-Reggiano, shaved with a vegetable peeler
instructions: Whisk together anchovies, garlic, lemon juice, vinegar, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Whisk in oil. Toss lettuce with dressing, then with cheese.
